name: Clipboard, unbundling tools for thought, microfeed, prepare to be productive & a look inside Matrix (Changelog News)
summary: Jackson Huffâ€™s clipboard powertool for the command line, Fernando Borretti thinks tools for thought should be unbundled, Listen Notes helps you run a microfeed on Cloudflare, Martin Rue says to be productive, be prepared &amp; Paul Sawers takes TechCrunch readers inside Matrix and features its recent adoption wins.
